*p**date_mentioned n="07-15-1826">July [15 about] 1826*/date_mentioned*. on *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p* *p*You will haeve heard of the Disaster on the *location_mentioned*Guadalupe */location_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Mr. Whigtman*/person_mentioned*. I wish to see you but am Confined with the *person_mentioned*wounded*/person_mentioned* man and *person_mentioned*Mr. Shields*/person_mentioned* who—is very dangerously ill—Should like to heare from you and what is to be done etc. I hope to be at *location_mentioned*St. felippe*/location_mentioned* in 8 or 10 days—Should *person_mentioned*Dewit */person_mentioned*have not then arrive [d], I shall set out for *location_mentioned*St. Antonio*/location_mentioned*—I wish to engage your thoughts on the subject of my establishing on the *location_mentioned*Rio Bacca*/location_mentioned*. My claim now (as the repre- sentative of the *person_mentioned*Empresario*/person_mentioned*) to settle that *location_mentioned*River */location_mentioned*is two fold greater than heretofore) first because there is not *location_mentioned*Territory */location_mentioned*sufficient without it; and secondly because I can not with the force I have sustain the *location_mentioned*upper settlement*/location_mentioned* Please think of this*/p* *p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
